20110119233025.000|20110119233028.000|CC1|WE BELIEVE THE OFFICER.

20110119233029.000|20110119233031.000|CC1|OFFICER IS LOCKING UP BEHIND HIM

20110119233036.000|20110119233038.000|CC1|IS NOT THE FAST THAT HE WAS     
20110119233038.000|20110119233039.000|CC1|WEARING, THIS IS ONE VERY       
20110119233039.000|20110119233042.000|CC1|SIMILAR TO IT.                  
20110119233042.000|20110119233044.000|CC1|IT DOES HAVE A VERY SOLID PANEL 
20110119233044.000|20110119233048.000|CC1|IN THE FRONT OF THE BEST, AND   
20110119233048.000|20110119233049.000|CC1|THAT IS THE LOCATION WHERE THE  
20110119233049.000|20110119233052.000|CC1|BULLETS STRUCK.

20110119233055.000|20110119233057.000|CC1|LIVE PICTURES FROM SKY9 RIGHT   
20110119233057.000|20110119233058.000|CC1|NOW.                            
20110119233058.000|20110119233100.000|CC1|AGAIN, RANDY WAS SHOWING US FROM
20110119233100.000|20110119233102.000|CC1|NORTHRIDGE HOSPITAL, ONE OF THE 
20110119233102.000|20110119233102.000|CC1|POLICE OFFICERS BRINGING OUT A  
20110119233102.000|20110119233104.000|CC1|SIMILAR VESTA THE OFFICER,      
20110119233104.000|20110119233105.000|CC1|SIMILAR TO THE ONE THAT THE     
20110119233105.000|20110119233106.000|CC1|OFFICER WAS                     
20110119233106.000|20110119233106.000|CC1|WEARING THIS MORNING            
20110119233106.000|20110119233108.000|CC1|WHEN HE WAS SHOT.               
20110119233108.000|20110119233110.000|CC1|WE HEARD THE DOCTOR SAY IT      
20110119233110.000|20110119233111.000|CC1|ABSOLUTELY SAVE HIS LIFE.       
20110119233111.000|20110119233113.000|CC1|HE WAS SHOT RIGHT OVER THE      
20110119233113.000|20110119233114.000|CC1|LARGEST PART OF THE HEART.      
20110119233114.000|20110119233117.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW THAT POLICE OFFICER   
20110119233117.000|20110119233121.000|CC1|WHO WE BELIEVE IS ABOUT 40 YEARS
20110119233121.000|20110119233122.000|CC1|OLD IS RESTING COMFORTABLY.     
20110119233122.000|20110119233124.000|CC1|WE ARE TOLD HE IS ON A GURNEY,  
20110119233124.000|20110119233125.000|CC1|BUT DOCTORS WANT TO LOOK HIM    
20110119233125.000|20110119233126.000|CC1|OVER TO MAKE SURE THAT THERE WAS
20110119233126.000|20110119233129.000|CC1|NO DAMAGE TO HIS HEART OR LUNGS.
20110119233129.000|20110119233130.000|CC1|THAT IS WHERE THE IMPACT OF THE 
20110119233130.000|20110119233132.000|CC1|BULLET HIT HIM.                 
20110119233132.000|20110119233133.000|CC1|THE DOCTORS SAID THE IMPACT WAS 
20110119233133.000|20110119233135.000|CC1|ENOUGH TO KNOCK HIM DOWN.       
20110119233135.000|20110119233136.000|CC1|LEYNA: INCREDIBLE WHEN YOU LOOK 
20110119233136.000|20110119233138.000|CC1|AT IT AND JUST HOW FORTUNATE    
20110119233138.000|20110119233139.000|CC1|THIS OFFICER WAS.               
20110119233139.000|20110119233141.000|CC1|REALLY WHEN YOU THINK ABOUT THE 
20110119233141.000|20110119233143.000|CC1|EVENTS OF THE DAY AND WHAT      
20110119233143.000|20110119233145.000|CC1|HAPPENED I PERSONALLY CONSIDER  
20110119233145.000|20110119233147.000|CC1|THIS OFFICER A HERO FOR STOPPING
20110119233147.000|20110119233149.000|CC1|THIS GUY BECAUSE HE DIDN'T THINK
20110119233149.000|20110119233152.000|CC1|TWICE ABOUT SHOOTING AN OFFICER.

20110119233157.000|20110119233158.000|CC1|VEST.                           
20110119233158.000|20110119233159.000|CC1|LEYNA: EXACTLY.                 
20110119233159.000|20110119233203.000|CC1|SO WHAT HAS HAPPENED, EVERYTHING
20110119233203.000|20110119233205.000|CC1|IS AS GOOD AS IT CAN BE OTHER   
20110119233205.000|20110119233206.000|CC1|THAN THE FACT THAT THIS GUY IS

20110119233210.000|20110119233211.000|CC1|GUY, WAS SHOT.                  
20110119233211.000|20110119233214.000|CC1|NOW WE ARE LOOKING FOR HIM.     
20110119233214.000|20110119233215.000|CC1|HOPEFULLY OFFICERS WILL BE ABLE 
20110119233215.000|20110119233217.000|CC1|TO FIND HIM VERY SOON SO THAT

20110119233220.000|20110119233221.000|CC1|AND PEOPLE CAN GET BACK INTO

20110119233225.000|20110119233226.000|CC1|NEARBY SCHOOL WHO SAW THIS GUY

20110119233312.000|20110119233313.000|CC1|THEY ARE AMONG THE 9,000

20110119233336.000|20110119233337.000|CC1|PLAN TO RELEASE THE STUDENTS    
20110119233337.000|20110119233340.000|CC1|FROM THIS CAMPUS.

20110119233342.000|20110119233344.000|CC1|CHIEF HOW LONG THE SEARCH WOULD 
20110119233344.000|20110119233345.000|CC1|GO ON FOR THE SUSPECT.          
20110119233345.000|20110119233347.000|CC1|THIS HAPPENED, AS YOU MENTIONED,
20110119233347.000|20110119233349.000|CC1|AT 1140 THIS MORNING.

20110119233408.000|20110119233411.000|CC1|CALL OFF THE SEARCH.

20110119233520.000|20110119233521.000|CC1|BULLETPROOF VEST, NOT THE VEST,

20110119233523.000|20110119233525.000|CC1|THIS OFFICER'S LIFE.            
20110119233525.000|20110119233526.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JOINING US NOW TO  
20110119233526.000|20110119233528.000|CC1|SHOW US A FAST VERY SIMILAR TO  
20110119233528.000|20110119233530.000|CC1|IT WHICH REALLY IS A LIFESAVER  
20110119233530.000|20110119233533.000|CC1|OF THIS ENTIRE BEEN DIFFICULT   
20110119233533.000|20110119233534.000|CC1|AFTERNOON AND MORNING THAT WE   
20110119233534.000|20110119233535.000|CC1|HAVE HAD.                       
20110119233535.000|20110119233537.000|CC1|CAN YOU SHOW US THAT THIS IS    
20110119233537.000|20110119233539.000|CC1|VERY SIMILAR?                   
20110119233539.000|20110119233540.000|CC1|>> OBVIOUSLY NOT THE ONE HE WAS 
20110119233540.000|20110119233542.000|CC1|WEARING, BUT SIMILAR.           
20110119233542.000|20110119233543.000|CC1|SOME BALLISTIC PANELS THAT      
20110119233543.000|20110119233545.000|CC1|STOPPED MOST SMALLER CALIBER    
20110119233545.000|20110119233547.000|CC1|AMMUNITION THAT WE ENCOUNTER AS 
20110119233547.000|20110119233548.000|CC1|POLICE OFFICERS ON THE STREET.  
20110119233548.000|20110119233551.000|CC1|IN THIS CASE IT DID ITS JOB.    
20110119233551.000|20110119233552.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IF WE CAN SHOW IT  
20110119233552.000|20110119233554.000|CC1|SIDEWAYS YOU CAN SEE HOW THIN IT
20110119233554.000|20110119233555.000|CC1|IS.                             
20110119233555.000|20110119233556.000|CC1|THERE IS REALLY NOT A WHOLE LOT 
20110119233556.000|20110119233558.000|CC1|OF MATERIAL BETWEEN THE OFFICER 
20110119233558.000|20110119233601.000|CC1|AND THE OUTSIDE OF THIS VAST.   
20110119233601.000|20110119233604.000|CC1|KEVLAR IS SUCH A POWERFUL PIECE 
20110119233604.000|20110119233606.000|CC1|OF MATERIAL THAT CAN TAKE THE   
20110119233606.000|20110119233608.000|CC1|FORCE AND SPREAD IT OVER A WIDER
20110119233608.000|20110119233608.000|CC1|AREA.                           
20110119233608.000|20110119233610.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT.                
20110119233610.000|20110119233612.000|CC1|THE OLDER ONES WERE MUCH MORE   
20110119233612.000|20110119233614.000|CC1|CLUNKY AND HEAVY AND THICK.     
20110119233614.000|20110119233615.000|CC1|THE NEWER ONES ARE MUCH MORE    
20110119233615.000|20110119233617.000|CC1|COMFORTABLE, WHICH IS GOOD      
20110119233617.000|20110119233620.000|CC1|BECAUSE THE OFFICERS WEAR THEM. 
20110119233620.000|20110119233621.000|CC1|>> NOW, A PLAY CAN BE PLACED IN 
20110119233621.000|20110119233622.000|CC1|THE CENTER POCKET.              
20110119233622.000|20110119233625.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT.                
20110119233625.000|20110119233625.000|CC1|BUT.                            
20110119233625.000|20110119233626.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WE DO KNOW THAT    
20110119233626.000|20110119233627.000|CC1|HE WAS HIT SOMEWHERE RIGHT      
20110119233627.000|20110119233628.000|CC1|AROUND HERE, WHICH IS VERY CLOSE
20110119233628.000|20110119233630.000|CC1|TO HIS LEFT VENTRICLE.          
20110119233630.000|20110119233632.000|CC1|IF HE WERE NOT WEARING THIS     
20110119233632.000|20110119233633.000|CC1|MESSED IT IS VERY POSSIBLE HE   
20110119233633.000|20110119233635.000|CC1|WOULD NOT BE HERE TODAY.        
20110119233635.000|20110119233636.000|CC1|>> SAID THE MOST PEOPLE WOULD   
20110119233636.000|20110119233637.000|CC1|AGREE HE WOULD NOT HAVE SURVIVED
20110119233637.000|20110119233639.000|CC1|THAT TYPE OF INJURY.            
20110119233639.000|20110119233643.000|CC1|IT WOULD HAVE BEEN MUCH MORE    
20110119233643.000|20110119233645.000|CC1|DIFFICULT.

20110119233645.000|20110119233646.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AS MANY OFFICERS   
20110119233646.000|20110119233648.000|CC1|WHO ARE WORKING THIS CASE TODAY 
20110119233648.000|20110119233650.000|CC1|LEARN ABOUT THIS WHAT DO YOU    
20110119233650.000|20110119233651.000|CC1|THINK THEIR THOUGHTS WILL BE AS 
20110119233651.000|20110119233654.000|CC1|THEY'VE PUT THEY'RE BEST ON?    
20110119233654.000|20110119233656.000|CC1|>> YOU ALWAYS GO WITH THE BEST  
20110119233656.000|20110119233658.000|CC1|SPOTS IN MIND, BUT YOU ALSO     
20110119233658.000|20110119233700.000|CC1|ALWAYS WANT TO BE PREPARED.     
20110119233700.000|20110119233701.000|CC1|HOPEFULLY IT IS A REMINDER FOR  
20110119233701.000|20110119233703.000|CC1|THOSE STILL TO RESIST WEARING   
20110119233703.000|20110119233704.000|CC1|THE VEST.
